DOC.brief_summary: To assess bioequivalence Fexofenadine Hydrochloride Orally Disintegrating Tablets 30 mg Dr. Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , India compare Allegra® ( contain fexofenadine hydrochloride ) Orally Disintegrating Tablets 30 mg Sanofi - aventis U.S. LLC , Bridgewater , NJ 08807 healthy , adult , human subject fast condition . To monitor adverse event ensure safety subject .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Fexofenadine Hydrochloride Orally Disintegrated Tablets 30 mg Under Fasting Condition
DOC.detailed_description: An open Label , Balanced , Randomized , Two-treatment , Two-period , Two-sequence , Single Dose , Crossover , Oral Bioequivalence Study Fexofenadine Hydrochloride Orally Disintegrating Tablets 30 mg Dr. Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , India Comparing With That Allegra ® ( Containing Fexofenadine Hydrochloride ) Orally Disintegrating Tablets 30 mg Sanofi - Aventis U.S. LLC , Bridgewater , NJ 08807 Healthy , Adult , Human Subjects Under Fasting Conditions .
